name: Catnap
desc: If unit takes no action except Wait, recovers up to 10% of max HP.

name: Goody Basket
desc: Chance to recover up to 10% of max HP at the start of each turn. Trigger % = Lck stat.

name: Songstress
desc: Adjacent allies recover up to 10% of max HP at the start of each turn.

name: Hunter’s Boon
desc: Grants Crit +20 when foe’s HP is ? 50%.

desc: If unit initiates combat and lands a hit, targeted foe loses up to 20% of max HP after combat.

name: Live to Serve
desc: When healing an ally with white magic, unit recovers the same amount of HP.

name: Lifetaker
desc: Unit recovers HP equal to 50% of damage dealt after defeating a foe.

name: Survival Instinct
desc: If unit initiates combat and defeats foe, grants Str/Mag/Dex/Spd +4 for one turn.

name: Lethality
desc: Chance to instantly kill a foe when dealing damage. Trigger % = 0.25×Dex.

name: Poison
desc: Chance to inflict poison on foe when dealing damage. Trigger % = Dex stat.

name: Pavise
desc: Chance to reduce sword/lance/axe/brawling damage by half. Trigger % = Dex stat.

name: Aegis
desc: Chance to reduce bow/magic damage by half. Trigger % = Dex stat.

name: Miracle
desc: Chance to survive lethal damage with 1 HP, if HP is > 1. Trigger % = Lck stat.

name: Terrain Resistance
desc: Nullifies damage from terrain.
origin: Class: Paladin, Bishop, Enlightened One, Holy Knight

name: Special Dance
desc: When using the Dance ability, grant Dex/Spd/Lck +4 to target ally.

name: Paragon
desc: Doubles experience earned.

desc: Multiplies this unit’s and adjacent allies’ experience earned by 1.2.

name: Discipline
desc: Doubles skill experience earned in battle.

name: Aptitude
desc: Makes each stat 20% more likely to increase on level up.

name: Vantage
desc: When foe initiates combat, unit still attacks first if HP is ≤ 50%.

name: Missing Number
desc: Missing Number (icon is based on Wary Fighter)

name: Desperation

name: Quick Riposte

name: Wrath
desc: If foe initiates combat while unit’s HP is ≤ 50%, grants Crit +50.

name: Dance
desc: Use Dance to allow an ally to move again.

name: Steal

name: Locktouch
desc: Allows unit to open doors and chests without keys.

name: Stealth
desc: Makes it more difficult for foes to target unit.

name: Canto
